full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE RNAM PAR 'JOMS PA'I SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE RNAM PAR 'JOMS PA'I SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO LA YID CHES KYI DAD PA BRTAN PA SOGS YON TAN MANG POS THUGS RGYUD PHYUG PA LHA LCAM RIN CHEN SKYID 'DZOM GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BRKA SHIS THEG CHEN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
